description: Try our easy to follow Mussels In Tomato & Chilli Broth recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Mussels In Tomato & Chilli Broth Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Add mussels to tomato broth. Cover with a lid and cook for 3-4 minutes or until mussels open. Discard any unopened mussels. Transfer mussels and broth to warm serving bowls. Serve with bread.
